channel.title: Classic-Legends.com | 2006 Remake | All Skills Working | 24/7
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][B]Classic-Legends[/B][/SIZE]
[url=http://classic-legends.com/]Site[/url] [url=http://classic-legends.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] [url=http://classic-legends.com/client.jar]Download Client[/url] [url=http://classic-legends.com/highscores/highscores.php]Highscores[/url]
Hi Moparscape
Today i want to release my 2006 Remake. It's based on CreativeScape, so many credits go to R0cky 0wnz for his perfect source. I did many edits on the Original CreativeScape source. Been working on this server for a long time and i think it's now time to release it.
~Features~
- All 21 Skills are working - The server is 24/7 Online - Duel Arena is working - Fight Caves are working - Castle Wars is working - Pest Control is working - Perfect combat system - All 2006 Shops - All 2006 NPC Spawns - And much much more!
~Screenshots~ [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/4.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/6.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/7.jpg[/img] [img]http://classic-legends.com/images/8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/sea746.jpg[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/a26hbm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/htspz9.gif[/img] [img]http://bildites.lv/images/h6tmc5c9yr4jm5lfdcwh.gif[/img] [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/6930/11044739.gif[/img] [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2vacfoh.gif[/img] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2ccwfaw.gif[/img] [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/ae2q6e.png[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: Classic-Legends.com | 2006 Remake | All Skills Working | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @InrestructServer InrestructServer
item.description:
@InrestructServer wrote:

[quote=“petterrs96, post:2, topic:536118”]When I logged on the server it started really laggy, doors are barely working, Tutorial island is veeerryyyy ugh… bad…

Farming is not working (you cannot buy the things you need)

You have the wrong interface that shows construction and hunting

The interface when clicking on a skill is so messed up.

You are rewarded with a Jester’s hat when you start playing (wich is form a holyday event)

You are also given 20.000 coins when starting (people can just make 100 account to get cash)

You are also given the wrong items when starting to play (battlestaff, Throwing knifes, Iron shield instead of the wooden shield)

there are no icons on the map showing where shops, quests, etc.

Crossbows are not supposed to be sold in the shops

Most npc dialogs are wrong. some of the npcs only said “welcome to classic legends”

Why are there tribal masks in thessalias’s rares. WHY IS THERE EVEN A SHOP FOR RARES?

Why is there a ring of duelling in the shop?

The gate into al kharid does not work.

The clipping for npcs are wrong

Few of the doors and the stairs are working

You loose energy really fast + that it re-generates with 15% at the time.

After killing 2 goblins i leveled to 4 attack, if you ask me, that is a wayyyyy to high exp rate.

you cannot arrage items in your bank

You cannot use the insert feature in the bank

all the diffirent skills share the same interface, every skill should have their own

I wouldn’t considder your forums a forum…

I’m NOT posting this as a hate comment, this is to warn the player that what you claim is not correct.
Anyways, I wish you the very best of luck with your server guys, even though i would recommend you to take it down and work a bit more on it before adertising

Keep in mind that i found these bugs within 10 minutes of playing.[/quote]

Today i’ve been fixing many bugs.
And i nearly fixed everything from your list.

Read full topic

item.title: Classic-Legends.com | 2006 Remake | All Skills Working | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Classic-Legends Classic-Legends
item.description:
@Classic-Legends wrote:

Gonna work on it man,
Sorry for dissapointing you.
I know the server has it’s bugs, but i want to show people the progress i make on the server.
By doing updates daily.

Read full topic

item.title: Classic-Legends.com | 2006 Remake | All Skills Working | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @petterrs96 petterrs96
item.description:
@petterrs96 wrote:

When I logged on the server it started really laggy, doors are barely working, Tutorial island is veeerryyyy ugh… bad…

Farming is not working (you cannot buy the things you need)

You have the wrong interface that shows construction and hunting

The interface when clicking on a skill is so messed up.

You are rewarded with a Jester’s hat when you start playing (wich is form a holyday event)

You are also given 20.000 coins when starting (people can just make 100 account to get cash)

You are also given the wrong items when starting to play (battlestaff, Throwing knifes, Iron shield instead of the wooden shield)

there are no icons on the map showing where shops, quests, etc.

Crossbows are not supposed to be sold in the shops

Most npc dialogs are wrong. some of the npcs only said “welcome to classic legends”

Why are there tribal masks in thessalias’s rares. WHY IS THERE EVEN A SHOP FOR RARES?

Why is there a ring of duelling in the shop?

The gate into al kharid does not work.

The clipping for npcs are wrong

Few of the doors and the stairs are working

You loose energy really fast + that it re-generates with 15% at the time.

After killing 2 goblins i leveled to 4 attack, if you ask me, that is a wayyyyy to high exp rate.

you cannot arrage items in your bank

You cannot use the insert feature in the bank

all the diffirent skills share the same interface, every skill should have their own

I wouldn’t considder your forums a forum…

I’m NOT posting this as a hate comment, this is to warn the player that what you claim is not correct.
Anyways, I wish you the very best of luck with your server guys, even though i would recommend you to take it down and work a bit more on it before adertising

Keep in mind that i found these bugs within 10 minutes of playing.

Read full topic
